The powder is very smooth and soft. It's smoother than standard loose powder because it's a setting powder. The shade that matches me for this setting powder is custard. But I wanted a brightening effect, so I took vanilla. It turned out to be what I expected, not too white but brightening. And most importantly, it's still the same color as my hands. I have light to medium with neutral undertones. I tried it on skin that's darker than mine, it doesn't make it gray. Although at first it was too white, it blended into my skin over time and gave a brightening effect. The puff is also okay. It's smooth and a bit thick, not too thin like a powder. The container is also luxurious. There's a separator so the powder doesn't spill easily or scatter everywhere. The diameter of the container is 6.5cm and 3cm high. There's also a mirror. It suits all complexion products from ESQA. In the photo, I'm using the cushion shade granola, concealer shade custard and setting powder shade vanilla. all from esqa. definitely recommended productsüëçüèª
